tranquility-title.author: Fantasy Flight Games
tranquility-title.name: Tranquility
tranquility-title.ability: While defending, after the Spend Defense Tokens step, if you spent fewer than 2 defense tokens, you may move up to 2 shields from 1 of your hull zones to the defending hull zone. If you do, the number of shields in that zone cannot exceed a maximum of “6.” You cannot recover shields while any zone is greater than its maximum shield value.
